title: Disconnects and connection issues
body: Idk if it's just me but the past 2-3 days there have been a HUGE amount of connection issues for me and a bunch of other people that i've been playing with on top of people flat out disconnecting entirely (not rage quitting cause it's game we have leads on and everyone is haha hoho hehe with each other). Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body: I looked at your recent games, but wasn't able to find a considerable amount of leavers or issues.  Cases like this are commonly due to an issue between your network and our game server.  If you are still experiencing an unstable connection, please go through our [Connection Troubleshoot ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)guide which can help get this fixed up.

im having the same issue past 4 days as i posted in a different post i have 40 ms and good fps nothing else is this bad at all and i went from wireless to wired connection just to see if that was why and its still the same.. my champ freezes while everyone else can still walk and sometimes i can still type i have good ping and ms . then theres times wher it spikes to 100-200 ms and i just dc and i have to reconnect like 3 times each game..
